page.title: 11A GRAFFHAM HEALTH VISITOR
page.content: Our Visitor has been a nurse for 20 years & has worked with children for 2 years.She decided to be a nurse ever since she was a child & trained for 3 years.She cares for children from 5-18 years & sometimes delivers babies if the mums want to have them at home. When she visits schools she checks our hair for headlice,helps the school doctor at medicals & carries out hearing & sight tests with special equipment.When a baby has been born she visits to make sure the new mum can cope & to weigh & measure them.The only real emergencies are when an old person collapses.If the old people suffer in the winter all the nurses help by getting blankets from the Red Cross.They also help them in their homes so they don't go into old people's homes, run a service so they can travel to a centre & meet others.
